Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of affordable homeownership opportunities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Veto and disapproval of Introductory Number 958-A of 2024 - A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of affordable homeownership opportunities
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto and disapproval of Introductory Number 958-A.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be affordable for extremely low-income and very low-income households

Items.MatterName: Citywide percentage of rental units in projects receiving city financial assistance that must be affordable for extremely low-income and very low-income households.
